original_text: Then I looked, and behold, a form that had the appearance of a man. Below what appeared to be his waist was fire, and above his waist was something like the appearance of brightness, like gleaming metal.
korean_text: 내가 보니 불 같은 형상이 있더라 그 허리 아래의 모양은 불 같고 허리 위에는 광채가 나서 단 쇠 같은데

sentences.original_text: Then I looked, and behold, a form
that had the appearance of a man.
Below what appeared to be his waist was fire,
and above his waist was something like the appearance of brightness,
sentences.korean_translation: 허리 위는 광채 같은 것이 보였는데
